title: Yield stability among potato varieties suitable for different agroecological regions of Bangladesh

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Istiak Ahmed, Jatish Chandra Biswas, Md. Abu Hena Sorwar Jahan, Sheikh Ishtiaque, Taslima Zahan, Md Ariful Islam, Laila A. Al-Shuraym, Samy Sayed, Ahmed Gaber, Akbar Hossain
